Text: Avast shows 3 virus alerts fr this torrent: Hate 971, WIN32:Cutwail-T and WIN32:Hupigon-ONX. Any idea about this?
I've had no such problems about my uploads, my friend. and neither do I have any problem with the software I use at the moment... What more can I say??
Ran a 2nd scan using TrendMicros Housecall and all was OK, so just a false pos I'm sure. Thanks for this great torrent.
It's nice to see some people that can select and appreciate good stuff. Cherish it, my friend..
